snippet.title: Red Beard 🧔 on Gold 🥇Hunt -  Classic Adobe Flash Game
snippet.description:
Go on a gold hunt with Red Beard. Activate the lifts and platforms by collecting the matching colored balls. Collect the gold to complete the level.

Links: 
https://www.miniclip.com/games/red-beard/en/
http://web.archive.org/web/20070428232432/http://www.miniclip.com/games/red-beard/en/

Direct link to swf file:
https://www.miniclip.com/games/red-beard/en/redbeard.swf
http://web.archive.org/web/20171114223656/https://www.miniclip.com/games/red-beard/en/redbeard.swf

Red Beard Windows Executable:
http://web.archive.org/web/20070316193500/http://www.miniclip.com/games/red-beard/red-beard.exe

I used the freeware Windows program: SWF File Player to open the swf file.
http://www.swffileplayer.com/   --
Website: https://www.nostalgiarealm.com
